name: Moving Day
description:
Meet Nyla. A 14 year old girl who is moving house.
However the old house looks to have other ideas.
Now work you way though your house to try an escape.
But which of the 6 endings will you get?

Will you wake up to your normal life, or will you be met with a new life?
Or will you be trapped forever?
Your actions will decide your fate.Features
  • Multiple Endings
  • Puzzles
  • Multiple Input Types (Point and Click, Keyboard or Controller)
